About Me

Raised by the 90's. Living in Austria. Available to work.

Hello I'm Iasmina,

a full-time Junior Frontend developer and part-time baker, based in Klagenfurt Austria.

I love to design and code beautiful simple things, bake delicious recipes and travel. I've always been someone who has both a creative and a logical side. I use my creative side to design and my logical side to code and I truly believe it is important to understand both design and development to achieve a successful user-facing product. I like to challenge myself and learn new things every day.
